EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128]]> We're pleased to offer the second Pivotal Support Update <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128]]>—our regular digest that curates the most relevant Pivotal knowledge, product updates, support services, and more, for you. Many of you checked out our inaugural issue, so let us know <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/PivotalSupportUpdate]]> how we're doing.
The Benefits of Business Critical Support A direct and ongoing proactive support engagement, provides the best product experience for customers. Find out how Pivotal’s Business Critical Support (BCS), delivered by a Designated Support Engineer (DSE), can help you on the path to easier and faster implementations. Click here <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128#bcs]]> to read more.
Top Knowledge Base Articles With increasing view counts, our Knowledge Base provides current content that is accessible and actionable. In this issue, we have selected the top articles that offer easy steps and quick tips for an optimum path to solutions. Read more here <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128#topten]]>.
Keep Up with the Latest Releases Find out the latest on Major Releases, Security Releases, and Upcoming Support Availability in our Product Updates <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128#updates]]>!
There’s more...you can find information on Pivotal Academy's <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128#academy]]> summer school and role based training, our Support News <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128#news]]> and our Global Support Social Offerings <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128#social]]>.
Head to the new Pivotal Support Update <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/221832128]]> for all of this and more.
